channel.title: Data Serialization :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: Perhaps the simplest persistent storage mechanism we can adopt is to use a combination of an in-memory variable and a file. For example, we could set up a simple database mechanism as a Node module: const fs = require('fs'); /** @module database * A simple in-memory database implementation, * providing a mechanism for getting and saving * a database object */ module.exports = { get, set }; // We retrieve and deserialize the database from // a file named data.
